oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Bel-Air Drive In Theatre, Nashville, Tennessee, n.d.
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The Bel-Air Drive In Theatre, located at 5811 Charlotte Avenue, Nashville, Tennessee. The movie sign reads “Weird, Wicked World” plus “Go Go Big Beat.” Some construction work is seen in the foreground. Forms part of Record Group 3, Metro Davidson County Photographer. 1 photograph negative, filmstrip : b & w.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Bel-Air Drive In Theatre (Nashville, Tenn.)
